pages.text: By simply mixing some $(l:bewitchment:brewing/elemental_oils)Aqua Cerate$() with $(item)Dye$(), handy, throwable Dye can be crafted.$(br)This $(item)Witchy Dye$() is used primarily to tint worn equipment, but it can also be used to dye $(l:bewitchment:creatures/werewolf)Werewolves$().

To create $(item)Witchy Dye$(), first brew $(item)Witchy Bleach$() in your $(l:bewitchment:tools/witch_cauldron)Cauldron$().$(br)You can add its dyeing properties by combining it with any $(item)Dye$(), otherwise it'll act as a bleach to remove color.
